section.name: Publisher's AstroGrid Library Overview
section.p: This component consists of a set of java library jars to help data owners publish their data to the International Virtual Observatory.
So there are libraries for processing ADQL/SQL and ADQL/XML documents, and for managing queries and streaming tables and creating the right SQL for different RDBMSs and so on.
There are also two 'ready made' webapps in WAR form for common data forms, including a skycatserver for sky object catalogues stored in RDBMS tables.

section.name: Introduction
section.p: These documents describe how to install these webapps; for details on the libraries, see the javadoc associated with each jar. There is also a page on building your own webapp from the library.
